summary: This document is an email chain from July 9, 2019, forwarding a Daily Beast article about Jeffrey Epstein's sex trafficking charges from the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The chain includes a forwarded message from Goretti Moya, a reporter, and shows internal discussion about the article.

persons.name: Goretti Moya
persons.context: Appears as the sender of a forwarded email about Jeffrey Epstein, likely providing the article link.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the forwarded Daily Beast article discussing his sex trafficking charges from SDNY and his history of evading justice.

events.title: Email discussion about Epstein article
events.description: Internal email chain forwarding a Daily Beast article about Jeffrey Epstein's SDNY sex trafficking charges.

keyFacts: An email chain from July 9, 2019, discusses a Daily Beast article about Jeffrey Epstein.
The article references Epstein's sex trafficking charges from the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The email includes a forwarded message from reporter Goretti Moya.
The document shows internal communication about Epstein's case as it was developing in July 2019.
